name: WhatTheHeck!
description:
It took me a while to actually export this as a game.

I  just want some sort of proof of my game in its alpha stages. So far you can only walk around and grab the box in the map(just by touching it),but you can't let go of it .

Tell me what you think, does it have potential? - if so I will start full time development on it. In the next update you can expect Grass, textured terrain and the ability to Grab and let go of objects with ease.

The game will aim to include multiplayer ie. LAN, so you can join your friends and will aim to launch on mobile(preferably).
